comment: Its saying ...not supported when I press the dialer icon on my watch ... Do I uninstalled it ... Please fix it ... !!

reply.author: DGApps
reply.content: Hello, thank you for the feedback. What kind of Android wear watch do you have, and what version of Android wear is it running. Please contact me at help.dgapps@gmail.com. We will sort this problem out. Thank you
